title: 97/362/EC: Commission Decision of 21 May 1997 recognizing in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of carfentrazone-ethyl, fosthiazate and fluthiamide in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 May 1997 recognizing in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of carfentrazone-ethyl, fosthiazate and fluthiamide in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance) (97/362/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 May 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 230, 19. 8. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 277, 30. 10. 1996, p. 25.
